quote: I'm here to tell you, there ain't much forgiveness in that old-time religion. That particular savior was a mean son of a bitch. If you sinned, honey, he was going to get you, no doubt about it.
quote_letters: IM HERE TO TELL YOU THERE AINT MUCH FORGIVENESS IN THAT OLD-TIME RELIGION THAT PARTICULAR SAVIOR WAS A MEAN SON OF A BITCH IF YOU SINNED HONEY HE WAS GOING TO GET YOU NO DOUBT ABOUT IT
